players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "With Diana gone, we've lost a detective. We need to stay sharp and focus on any suspicious behavior. Alice and Bob, what do you think happened?"
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found out his role. We need to vote him out to win."
Bob: "That's a bold claim, Alice. If you were really detective, why claim instantly instead of waiting to see reactions? Also, Diana was the detective, so your story doesn't add up."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're not the mafioso, why do you think Alice is lying? We need clear reasons to trust you over her."

Bob: "Charlie, think this through: Diana’s death screams she was the detective. If Alice were the real detective, she wouldn’t out herself Day 1 when the real doc is gone. She’s opportunistic—vote Alice."

You: "Bob is trying to manipulate the situation by claiming Diana was the detective. I revealed my identity because I know he's the mafioso. Charlie, I need your trust to vote Bob out and secure our win."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "With Diana gone, we've lost a detective. We need to stay sharp and focus on any suspicious behavior. Alice and Bob, what do you think happened?"
Alice: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found out his role. We need to vote him out to win."
You: "That's a bold claim, Alice. If you were really detective, why claim instantly instead of waiting to see reactions? Also, Diana was the detective, so your story doesn't add up."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're not the mafioso, why do you think Alice is lying? We need clear reasons to trust you over her."

You: "Charlie, think this through: Diana’s death screams she was the detective. If Alice were the real detective, she wouldn’t out herself Day 1 when the real doc is gone. She’s opportunistic—vote Alice."

Alice: "Bob is trying to manipulate the situation by claiming Diana was the detective. I revealed my identity because I know he's the mafioso. Charlie, I need your trust to vote Bob out and secure our win."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
